newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Allied Group FY97 raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Allied Group FY97 raised.

text.p: -- EVEREN Securities Inc said Wednesday it raised its estimate for Allied Group Inc's earnings in fiscal 1997 to $2.92 a share from $2.83. The 1998 estimate is $3.25 a share.
-- The change is the result of several factors, including slightly higher top line expectations for property and casualty premium growth, analyst C. Gregory Peters said.
-- Peters also cited an "exceptionally good" fourth quarter for Allied Group's excess and surplus subsidiary, which prompted an adjustment of his loss assumptions.
-- Allied Group is an insurance holding company.
-- Its shares were trading up 5/8 Wednesday at 32-3/4.
